name: Venison Chili
keywords: ground venison, red kidney beans, main course
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound dried red kidney beans, soaked in water overnight
1 28-ounce can whole peeled tomatoes, coarsely chopped, liquid reserved

recipeInstructions.text: In a large kettle, heat olive oil. Brown the onions and meat and season with salt and pepper. Add the garlic, kidney beans, spices, chilies and tomatoes. Stir until blended.
Stir in tomato liquid and V-8. Cover and simmer for about 2 hours.
When ready to serve, place in individual heatproof bowls. Sprinkle onion over top. Cover with cheese. Place under a preheated broiler until cheese is melted.
